description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) and 3 (Materials) of planning permission ref: 2023/00825/FUL granted 9th June 2023 for the 'Erection of a rear extension at first floor level, on top of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side of the existing back addition; installation of new bi-folding doors to replace the existing doors at ground floor level to the rear elevation; installation of new French doors to replace the existing window and formation of a roof terrace at second floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of roof tiles with slate tiles to match surrounding area; replacement of windows with hardwood timber sash to match existing style; installation of new railings on top of the existing boundary wall to the front elevation' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: installation of glazed roofing in place of the rooflights to the roof of single storey rear extension.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
